short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: The Transparency add-on will help you fell safer when you browse end shop online.
short.da: Med Gennemsigtigheds add-on forsøger vi at gøre det mere trygt at bruge og handle på internettet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Transparency add-on will help you feel safer when you browse and shop online. By using publicly available data, if possible, we show the owner of a domain along with the country of origin.
